column5: Looks like I'll be one of the first volunteers out on the water helping the MNR with their Lake Simcoe Muskellunge Restoration Project!!  Talk about being excited, it's like being a little kid on Xmas Eve.  I'll bring along the camera (After checking with my MNR guide of course)  but it should be a fun day out on the water.  Weather for Wednesday looks good, 8 degree's and sunny.  Perhaps this will be my best learning experience when it comes to muskies yet!  (This coming a close second to our one and only Lew  ).   I will try to keep my mouth shut (somewhat) and my ears open.  Hopefully I'll have some pics for you guys Wed night!
Muskies in Simcoe, eh! Along with Pike?
Good to see the enthusiasm Bill! I'll be out there helping on May 14th.  Muskie can co-exist with Pike...They've been doing it for thousands of years...
Remember Bill... leave your Team #5 Logo at home !!
Hey Bill  Have fun out there. I'll be watching for the report and hopefully pics when you return.  Mike

Keep us updated guys, if I had the time off I would definitely be volunteering. Looking forward to how it goes....  Dax, I still have to sign up and get in for a meeting this summer, expect me (if I dont get shipped to Ottawa for work)
if I was up in Ontario i would volunteer for this program. Sounds like fun Bill, have a great time!
